Reviews.Title: “Spend a little more and stay elsewhere ....”
Reviews.Author: Lanster
Reviews.Content: Overall experience was poor ... staff was OK ... location is good ... Sri Lankan food was good ... rooms large and clean, but dated ... lots of action in the bar, but I understand "guests" not allowed in the rooms, which seems kinda odd. I would suggest you spend $20 more and have a much better experience.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay but prostitutes problem”
Reviews.Author: kazamodia
Reviews.Content: We stayed at that hotel in July, 2011 I booked through asiatravel and when I arrived there at the lobby I was totally shocked by what I saw as we were a family !! prostitutes going up and down I was afraid to stay there and asked for a room at the 6th floor, no one helped in the luggage but when I arrived at the room it was very nice and huge, very clean along with the bathroom but it was cheap 160 AED per day without breakfast and location was good 15 minutes walk to the metro station and with the new metro station it would only be a 5 minutes walk I tried the breakfast only one day it was nice Wifi is very expensive in the hotel but I bought a 15 minutes voucher with username and password with 5 AED and it worked with me all along my stay :D I recommend it to people without families

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended!”
Reviews.Author: Ismail Y
Reviews.Content: This place is a brothel! Hookers everywhere like cockroaches coming out of the woodwork. Not recommended for families or couples. If you are a bachelor and into hookers then watch out - police always waiting outside!

Reviews.Title: “Not for a family with children.”
Reviews.Author: tourinfofriend
Reviews.Content: The Hotel was noisy all night due to Club downstairs.No one at reception understood English.The parking was awful.Theres prostitutes coming in and out of Hotel all day and night everytime we came out our rooms they would be walking in coridoors or in reception area.As well as prostitutes parading outside Hotel and in roads openly.This was more like a sleazy 2 star Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “looking forward again”
Reviews.Author: jaik32
Reviews.Content: Well the hotel location is v good and room , restaurant & bar I rate as good comparing to other near by hotels , but I have to say abt the bar tender at the night club is very aggressive & has no respect for his guest v rood and impatient ,I think the management must look in to it & I strongly do not recommend this hotel to any one .

Reviews.Title: “good but...”
Reviews.Author: jackidubai
Reviews.Content: The hotel is cheap and good.but the lady at the front desk always try to get money for different things.she charge persons for taking ladies to their rooms and put the money in her pocket,(i saw and i'm sure).and something very funny every time she change the price for that and take it upper saying the police may coming and it is very bad for us!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap!!”
Reviews.Author: KarmicThoughts
Reviews.Content: The hotel is one of the cheap options in Bur Dubai. The rooms are not too clean and the lobby is small and crampy. The pub in the hotel is loud and lousy. Good for the location and money.

Reviews.Title: “It was awful. Don't choose this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: MariaZoloto
Reviews.Content: Room was noisy, uncomfortable and dirty. Personel was unfelpful and really not friendly. There was a bar on the 1st floor with prostitutes. A lot of prostitutes in hotel at day and at night. There was no bus to the beach. Meal was untasty. Do not recommend espessially for girls which travell without spouse. Choose another hotel

Reviews.Title: “Best bet for the money”
Reviews.Author: neelsb
Reviews.Content: It is centrally located 10 min from the airport and Burj Tower. Rooms are very clean and big. Breakfast is good. Probably it is best bet for the money. Shops and Supermarket are just in next buildings. We had booked through GTA and it cost us AED 250 per day. They are good in arranging nice desert safari at very competitive price. Only drawback is very costly Internet and no Wi-Fi in rooms. Though they have pub at ground floor, the noise is well controlled. We did not hear any noise even in the corridor.

Reviews.Title: “"Very nice staff."”
Reviews.Author: north4949
Reviews.Content: I stayed on two different ocassions for two nights each in May. Nice price with very helpful and courteous staff. The price is affordable and rooms are nice. The Jockey Pub was very cozy and atmospheric. Lots of working girls but I was able to comfortably drink a few beers without being harrassed any more than I wanted to be. The draft beer was poured in a bigger than normal glass and was only 14 dirhams. Security was tight as ladies were not allowed to approach you in the lobby or out front. If a lady was escorted upstairs by a guest an ID was left at the front desk. Mall was close by and Taxi's were abundent. Staff was excellent and helpful. I will definately stay only there as I go through Dubai every 3 months or so.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Jack_TarrRFA
Reviews.Content: An interesting place. For the price paid (100Dhs for a night including room service) what more could one expect? The room was basic, but clean although the air conditioning was a bit clanky (although I didn't hear any pigeons...) but the noise from the Jockey bar downstairs was very loud. The bathroom although clean was not up to much as the hot water was either off or unavailable and there was no plug for the bath so it was a choice of shower or shower! The bed was comfortable and importantly the sheets were fresh. The Jockey Bar has, I believe, been unfairly slated in reviews on this site. Yes, there are certain ladies of ill-repute ( a varied selection at that :) ) that frequent the bar, but they will not approach you unless you make indications to them that you are "looking for business". The beer is good and it is a good old fashiooned smokey pub that can be enjoyed without getting any hassle. On the whole I thoroughly enjoyed it!

Reviews.Title: “A good budget hotel in Dubai..”
Reviews.Author: bibodubai
Reviews.Content: I stayed seven nights at the Panorama Bur Dubai. Compared to other budget hotels either in Bur Dubai or Deira, i found this one being the nicest. The location is fine since you are close to Malls and not far from the Beach Community ( Jumeirah, Umm Suqeim ). The rooms are acceptable and the staff will clean everyday and change the towels and sheets. The room air conditioning can be noisy, however and since i always sleep with ear plugs i could sleep well. The beds are confortable. If i have an advise to give you, when booking either on the phone or through the internet, ask for a top floor room ( there is six floors in the Panorama Bur Dubai ), you will still hear the loud music from the Jockey's Club, but less than if you would stay on the first three floors ( actually i can barely imagine how people could stay a single night on the lower floors...). The staff is effective so is the room service, the food is good when you order to your room and delivered within twenty minutes. The breakfast at the restaurant downstairs is vey basic and still acceptable for the price. The Jockey's Club at the lobby entrance is a nice place for a drink, howvere be aware that it is a pick-up point which mean that there is a lot of chinese, philippinas hookers, however they will not bother you unless you ask for it.... The Philippino girl at the reception and as far as my experience in this hotel, is very unpleasant, she would not even say good morning nor smile, and look at you like if you were not paying the price for staying there... Perhaps she should join the Jockey's Club for a couple of nights....

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel - but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: azzy786
Reviews.Content: the room had a kind of stale smell to it. that was probably because of the air conditioning that had'nt been cleansed or serviced in years (if at all). It does make a loud noise and you can hear pigeons sitting in it on the exterior side. The single beds are firm and comfortable. I found the bathroom appauling as it was sub-standard, the shower had a leak and there were many moths/misqito type insects and fleas flying around in the bath. so pretty disgusting. The nice philipino girl on the desk is helpful. Good thing about the hotel is the location; bus stop to city/airport within 2 mins walk, major shopping mall with Mc D's and KFC (both open till late) also next door. If you want cheap accomodation without the luxury and not staying more than 3 nights..... then this is just about bareable!!

Reviews.Title: “interesting place”
Reviews.Author: swineyglobetrotters
Reviews.Content: Our room seemed a little shabby - although it did have everything we needed. The airconditioning unit was quite loud and everything just seemed a little run down! On the positive side though, we got to the hotel at about 6am and the let us check in early and managed to provide us a room about 8am. Also there is a club/bar on the ground floor so if you're on the first few floors of the hotel it is apparently quite noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting Place!”
Reviews.Author: gfsdgdsfd
Reviews.Content: I was staying in this hotel in May 2007 and my only advise for people is NOT to visit this hotel at all. This place is disgusting! The area is so bad and not safe at all for decent ladies and also for children. This is a famous joint for pick-ups. Husbands -Please do NOT take you family to this place. If you do, you will really really regret it.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, Great location, Great staff, Great stay.”
Reviews.Author: chingy79
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in a great location with 3 shopping centres on the same street and 3 big name eating out places too. Cheap to stay in and contained all the facilities you need if you just want to stay somewhere for a while. Clean, tidy and friendly. Staff were helpful, friendly and good to deal with. I enjoyed my stay there and have no complaints. Good bar facility and facility to book trips and excursions out too. Only bad point would be that breakfast was not worth going to. Totally recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A Paranormal Experience”
Reviews.Author: Paraglider
Reviews.Content: The place is basic but the staff are very friendly and helpful. The famous Jockey's Bar on the ground floor is a UAE institution. It is NOT a brothel but it is certainly a 'meeting place' and unlike some others in Bur Dubai, there is an unwritten code of at least reasonable behaviour. So it is safe and fun. In the summer, beware of the 'cold' water in this hotel as it is usually too hot to touch! http://www.paranormal-hotel.blogspot.com for more info.

Reviews.Title: “Bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a 2 star, fair enough BUT be warned there are 5 night clubs/brothels. The hotel does not offer complementary city transfers even though it says that on the web. VERY loud music played every night till 3.00am. NOT family friendly. Please take my advise and don't book this hotel, you will regret it and it will ruin your holiday.

HotelInfo.Name: Panorama Hotel Bur Dubai
HotelInfo.Address: Al Mankhool Road | PO Box 14703, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
